title: The Forced Isolation of Children in the Covid Era
sub_head: More acknowledgment that harms were many and benefits were few.
body:
If the Covid era doesn’t make one suspicious of government, it’s hard to imagine what would. Two years after state and local officials—egged on by federal disease doctors—started inflicting massive burdens on U.S. children, reports of the ineffectiveness of mandated public health measures and their destructive side effects continue to roll in.
Of course American governments weren’t the only ones imposing painful pseudo-scientific remedies. Now Spanish scientists at a number of universities report on a large study of Catalonian kids, some of whom were forced to cover their faces in school and some of whom weren’t:
